question:
What is the formula for calculating force?
A: F = ma
B: F = mv
C: F = m/v
D: F = m*a

What is the unit of resistance?
A: Ampere
B: Volt
C: Ohm
D: Watt

What is the SI unit of frequency?
A: Hertz
B: Joule
C: Pascal
D: Newton

What is the process by which light travels through a medium?
A: Reflection
B: Refraction
C: Absorption
D: Diffraction

What is the formula for calculating work?
A: W = F*d
B: W = F/v
C: W = m/v
D: W = m*a

What is the process of converting a solid directly to a gas without passing through a liquid state called?
A: Sublimation
B: Condensation
C: Melting
D: Freezing

What is the formula for calculating power?
A: P = W/t
B: P = F/d
C: P = F*a
D: P = m/v

What is the process of converting a gas directly to a solid without passing through a liquid state called?
A: Deposition
B: Condensation
C: Melting
D: Freezing

What is the formula for calculating pressure?
A: P = F/A
B: P = W/t
C: P = F/d
D: P = m/v

What is the process by which a solid changes directly into a gas without passing through a liquid state called?
A: Sublimation
B:Melting
C: Vaporization
D: Condensation

What is the formula for calculating density?
A: D = m/V
B: D = V/m
C: D = P/A
D: D = F/d

What is the process by which a liquid changes into a gas at a temperature below its boiling point called?
A: Evaporation
B: Condensation
C: Sublimation
D: Melting

What is the formula for converting Celsius to Fahrenheit?
A: F = (C x 9/5) + 32
B: F = (C + 32) x 9/5
C: F = C - 32
D: F = C x 5/9

What is the formula for converting Fahrenheit to Celsius?
A: C = (F - 32) x 5/9
B: C = F x 9/5 + 32
C: C = F + 32
D: C = F x 5/9

What is the unit of measurement for energy?
A: Joule
B: Newton
C: Watt
D: Volt

What is the unit of measurement for power?
A: Watt
B: Joule
C: Newton
D: Volt

What is the process by which a gas changes into a liquid called?
A: Condensation
B: Vaporization
C: Sublimation
D: Melting

What is the process by which a liquid changes into a solid called?
A: Freezing
B: Condensation
C: Sublimation
D: Melting

What is the process by which a solid changes into a liquid called?
A: Melting
B: Freezing
C: Condensation
D: Sublimation

What is the formula for calculating velocity?
A: v = d/t
B: v = F/m
C: v = a/t
D: v = P/t

What is the formula for calculating acceleration?
A: a = (v2 - v1)/t
B: a = F/m
C: a = P/t
D: a = v/d

What is the unit of measurement for current?
A: Ampere
B: Volt
C: Ohm
D: Watt

What is the unit of measurement for voltage?
A: Volt
B: Ampere
C: Ohm
D: Watt

What is the unit of measurement for resistance?
A: Ohm
B: Ampere
C: Volt
D: Watt

What is the unit of measurement for frequency?
A: Hertz
B: Joule
C: Pascal
D: Newton

What is the process by which sound waves bounce off a surface called?
A: Reflection
B: Refraction
C: Absorption
D: Diffraction

What is the process by which sound waves bend as they pass through a medium of different density?
A: Refraction
B: Reflection
C: Absorption
D: Diffraction

What is the formula for calculating electric power?
A: P = IV
B: P = I2R
C: P = V2/R
D: P = IR

What is the formula for calculating electric current?
A: I = V/R
B: I = P/V
C: I = W/t
D: I = Q/t
